title: ADC Main looking for a Plat+ duo support
body: I'm looking for someone to help me climb up through plat. Needs to be online a fair amount, be willing to use voip (preferably teamspeak but doesn't have to be) and also have a positive attitude even in the worst situations :)

replies.body:
EEYYYYYYYYY bb. I'm Gold 1 (currently in the promos to plat) 
I main morg Support :P, But I can also top or mid if I need 2.
IGN: SomeoneNerfMe
Hey, i tried adding you but it says your name wasn't found, can you add me instead?
